course_details: This course covers the fundamentals of programming, including basic syntax, algorithms, and problem-solving.
Learn the essentials of web development, HTML, CSS, and introductory JavaScript for building .
Explore the basics of data science, including data analysis, visualization, and introductory machine learning concepts.
Build mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms using popular frameworks like React Native and Flutter.
Learn the fundamental principles of cybersecurity, including encryption, network security, and ethical .
Explore the basics of graphic design, including principles of design, color theory, and popular design tools.
Gain insights into business analytics, data-driven decision-making, and analytics tools like Tableau and Power BI.
Learn effective digital marketing strategies, including social media marketing, SEO, and online advertising.
Introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning, and applications in various fields.
